website_summaries.verdict: This soldering kit works well for smaller electronics and includes a power switch.
pros: This 11-in-1 soldering kit comes equipped with a 60-watt, 110-volt iron
It also includes a solder sucker, two anti-static tweezers, a stand, and tips
cons: Both the stand and carrying case are on the low-quality side
Some claim that the case arrived damaged
Reports of the tips breaking easily

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad kit
customer_reviews.text: I'm a novice solderer, so I didn't want to spend a fortune on something I might not be good enough at to bother with later on. Turns out I'm better than I expected and this kit certainly didn't hinder me at all. I will say the base isn't heavy enough, I don't feel like I can walk away with a hot tip and not freak out about it falling over while I'm away. Having very little experience with soldering irons, I will say I wish the grip was closer to the tip for dexterity purposes, but that may not be a realistic expectation out of an iron since it gets so hot. No idea.
customer_reviews.author: KRAM02

customer_reviews.title: Decent deal / Toolbox too small & mine was broken.
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, this is a good kit/good value. My main issues are the toolbox and stand. The stand is cheaply made and the sponge is the wrong size. It does the job well enough. The toolbox was the worst part. It was broken and it will not hold the assembled stand. Other than these items, the rest of the kit , including the iron, is def good enough.
customer_reviews.author: G. DePotter

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: I am new to soldering so I don't know much about what's quality vs what's not but this is perfect for a novice and did exactly what I needed. I bought this specifically to complete one project of splicing and soldering some automotive wires. However, I have been wanting to try my hand at other small electronic projects and this kit has almost everything I need to pursue a new hobby. I also love the little carrying case. It helps me keep everything together.
customer_reviews.author: TXHoundUp

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift for my fiance and he loves it! It comes with everything that he needs in order to solder. The case is what made me purchase this one over all the others on Amazon because it helps keep everything together and organized. The temperature set on the soldering is another feature that is a plus to have so that you can set the temperature you need in order to solder the items you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Hectic Mom Jamie《Hectic Mommy Material》

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need for basic home soldering.
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need for basic home soldering. Nothing fancy. Has enough accessories to get you started. And cheap enough that if you outgrow it, you haven't spent a lot
customer_reviews.author: rj

customer_reviews.title: Great for the $
customer_reviews.text: Have used this a number of times now and really like it. Cheap price when I bought it. Low quality case (no surprise) good accessories, has worked great for me so far. I would call this a great value
customer_reviews.author: Robawsm

customer_reviews.title: Great little kit for home use so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far I have repaired a laptop charging cord, installed two sets of trailer lights, and other various elecronic repairs. So far this kit has been great. The iron gets good and hot like it should, the extra tips are nice to have. Aside from heat shrink the kit contains everything I've needed for my uses thus far. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: I love this little kit
customer_reviews.text: I love this little kit, it comes with everything you need to start soldering. Im new to it so it was nice to have everything i could possibly need in on kit. Tje case isnt the highest quality but it is sturdy enough for the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Stody

customer_reviews.title: For the price you cannot go wrong
customer_reviews.text: The quality surprised me in a good way. Everything is solid and the toolbox locks up good and tight. The stand is "OK" better than anything in its price range but the sponge is a joke. I will find a way to secure it to the stand but you cannot wipe a tip off with one hand you have to hold down the sponge..
customer_reviews.author: Steve E. Byrum

customer_reviews.title: Great for circuit boards..!!
customer_reviews.text: Very good kit. Iron heats up fast and feels good in your hand. I used it first time to solder GPIO header on raspberry pi zero W and it did a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: Wood chopper

customer_reviews.title: An amazing kit. I have been soldering for over 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: An amazing kit. I have been soldering for over 2 years in the lab. But this kit brings it all in one and even more. Some of the things I dont event know about. Would have been great if it came with list of tools and materials, or even instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t knock off too many stars for the case being damaged. This is a cheap kit and you get what you pay for. That being said, it was still a good value. I didn’t actually want or need the case. All the equipment worked as expected, and some of the tools were of decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Not high end, but very capable. Now when my kids want to solder something they have one box with everything in it, and when done, everything goes right back in it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it... Highly recommended 😀
customer_reviews.text: Completely satisfied. Quick delivery. No problems with packaging & shipping. Great value. Quality a plus.Everything needed is included in a solder kit. A must buy. Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: j0e

customer_reviews.title: Very handy.
customer_reviews.text: Soldering Iron Kit with On/Off Switch 60W 110V...Very handy with a lot of tools to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Secretariat

customer_reviews.title: This is a good kit. I especially like the on/off switch and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good kit. I especially like the on/off switch and all the tips you get. I actually own two of them. Keep one in the van and one in the shop.
customer_reviews.author: tetek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit with all the basics
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit that comes with all the basics. I was able to install a new potentiometer on my guitar no-problem. The case is a little flimsy but who cares? Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: A great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: A great deal for the price. The soldering iron takes a little while longer to heat up than an $80 soldering station, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe B.

customer_reviews.title: Good kit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice starting kit for one needing to have a soldering iron on hand. The tool box makes it a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jalazz

customer_reviews.title: I'm a happy old man today
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new soldering kit since my old one disappeared over the years//moves. I'm a happy old man today!
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good bargain
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this yet, but its a basic soldering iron. For the price it is a complete kit with a nice small storage box
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Picture looks nice, A little sketchy for any serious solder work.
customer_reviews.author: Fargo Dude

customer_reviews.title: Garbage do not buy
customer_reviews.text: falls apart after a couple light uses. Get a real soldering iron like a weller
customer_reviews.author: ArsMagna

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I just recieved my order and so far every appears to be worth the price as long as the tools hold up but overall I am satisfied
customer_reviews.author: amanda rigdon

customer_reviews.title: Terrible directions
customer_reviews.text: The "directions" are translated into English by someone who is clearly not fluent. Not sure what a couple of the items are because they are not labeled or mentioned any where in the directions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Received it a few weeks ago with all items included as was stated in the description. Have used it a few times since then so far so good - the iron gets hot fast and solders well. Will see how it fares over time but definitely worth buying and hard to beat at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really nice kit for the price. Will get you started on most projects. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Stro

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good for small jobs, you need a heavier iron for larger wiring.
customer_reviews.author: CapnBill

customer_reviews.title: Just cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Fair choice for a begginer, though. The soldering iron stand is terrible, but the overall usefulness of the kit compensates that.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Good Soldering Kit
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and got the job done fixing an old 50 inch LG plasma TV with a blown resistor.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit. Seems to work fine
customer_reviews.text: Nice kit. Seems to work fine. The box is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money.it probably won't last as long as a hakko but it's no where near as much
customer_reviews.author: Lance B.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use. Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: Just got it last night. I tested it out. It works pretty good for the price. Easy to use. So far I'm pretty impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Work great. Very nice feel, features, and case
customer_reviews.author: John B.

product_meta.title: Soldering Iron Kit with On/Off Switch 60W 110V Adjustable Temperature Welding Soldering Iron, 5pcs Tips, Solder Sucker, Solder Wire, Tweezers, Desoldering Wick, Iron Stand and Sponge with Tool Case
feature_bullets: 11-in-1 Full Kit - Kit comes with soldering iron, 5 soldering tips, solder wire, soldering sucker (desoldering pump), solder wick, iron stand with cleaning sponge, 2 anti-static tweezers, Diagonal cutting pliers and a tool box. This tool set make it perfect for family use such as electric repair, home DIY or wood burning projection, etc.

On/Off switch- This soldering iron can be turned on/off easily to save energy and ensure safe welding. With upgraded ceramic heater chip, it can heat up quickly. Adjustable temperature with thermostat range 200~450℃ (392-842℉).
Steel-pipe design -The four ventilation holes on the solder tip provide better heat dissipation than others. Upgraded PCBA with chip fixed resistor also helps dissipate heat quickly.

Safe and environmental protection soldering wire included. There are ingredient listed on the tinned tube package, lead free solder wire is environmentally friendly, non-toxic, non-polluting, safe to use.
Easy for storage and carry - The multifunctional tool box is an additional feature, and convenient to store small tools and portable for DIY work and other electric repair.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars77 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
